eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A BLUE ALERT FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Anderson; Angelina; Cherokee; Freestone; Gregg; Harrison; Henderson; Houston; Jasper; Kaufman; Leon; Limestone; Madison; Nacogdoches; Navarro; Panola; Polk; Robertson; Rusk; Sabine; San Augustine; San Jacinto; Shelby; Smith; Trinity; Tyler; Upshur; Van Zandt; Walker; Wood, TX; AT 08:07 PM ON NOV 02, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 08:07 PM NOV 03, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: Blue Alert: Jacksonville, TX Suspect is BOBBY DENNIS wanted for involvement in the serious injury of a law enforcement officer. DENNIS is a 64 year old black male, last seen wearing a black jacket, and all black clothing and may be driving a Gray 2012 GMC Sierra with TX license plate TRW3919. Call Jacksonville PD with information. If seen call 9 1 1.
